sense.def:
To hesitate
pomeni malo obmolkniti, medtem ko nekaj počnemo ali tik preden nekaj storimo, navadno zato, ker smo negotovi, v zadregi ali zaskrbljeni.

seg.quote: She put her hand on the phone, hesitated for a moment, then picked up the receiver.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
hesitates to do something
, ni voljan nekaj storiti, ker ni prepričan, da je pravilno ali pošteno.

seg.quote: Don't hesitate to go to a doctor if you have any unusual symptoms.
